title: Initialize workspace and copy templates
acceptance: workspace目录存在且模板文件齐全

title: Draft kickoff questions + seed queries
acceptance: DECISIONS含C0问题块；queries.md 含非空关键词

title: Collect candidate papers (multi-route) and normalize metadata
acceptance: papers_raw.jsonl >= 200 条记录（survey 目标），且每条含 title/authors/year/url + 稳定标识（arxiv_id/doi）+ provenance；retrieval_report.md 记录来源/覆盖桶/缺失字段统计

title: Dedupe+rank and produce core set
acceptance: 去重后重复率<2%，dedup 池足够大；survey 目标 core_set >=150（为后续 citations>=150 与每小节证据绑定留出空间）

title: Build taxonomy (2-level minimum)
acceptance: taxonomy至少2层且节点有说明

title: Build outline bullets from taxonomy
acceptance: outline含章节+小节，且每小节至少3个bullet

title: Map papers to each subsection
acceptance: 每小节映射>=8篇论文（survey 默认更高以支撑 evidence-first 写作），覆盖率>=80%

title: Planner pass: coverage report + outline state (NO PROSE)
acceptance: coverage_report.md 含 per-subsection 表；outline_state.jsonl 至少1条记录；无占位/无省略号

title: Draft C2 review summary (scope+outline)
acceptance: DECISIONS含C2 review摘要

title: HUMAN approve C2 (scope+outline)
acceptance: 勾选 DECISIONS.md 的 Approve C2

title: Download PDFs + extract fulltext snippets
acceptance: fulltext_index非空；若 evidence_mode=fulltext 则需若干篇提取成功（strict 会拦截接近0）

title: Write paper notes + evidence bank for core set
acceptance: core_set覆盖率100%；标注 evidence_level；生成 papers/evidence_bank.jsonl（>=1 evidence item/纸均值）；避免大量重复模板泄漏到下游

title: Build subsection briefs (writing cards) [NO PROSE]
acceptance: 每个H3生成写作意图卡（scope_rule/rq/thesis/axes/clusters/paragraph_plan(8–10; argument_role+connector_to_prev+connector_phrase)）；无省略号/无占位符

title: Build chapter briefs (H2 writing cards) [NO PROSE]
acceptance: 每个含H3的H2生成 chapter brief（synthesis_mode+synthesis_preview+throughline/key_contrasts/lead_paragraph_plan）；无占位/无省略号

title: Verify citations and build ref.bib
acceptance: ref.bib每条都有verified.jsonl记录（url+date+title）

title: Bind evidence IDs to subsections (evidence plan) [NO PROSE]
acceptance: 每个H3绑定 evidence_ids（>=10，默认 binder 选 14）；evidence_ids 可在 evidence_bank 中定位；无占位/无省略号

title: Build evidence packs per subsection [NO PROSE]
acceptance: 每个H3有证据包（>=3 concrete comparisons；evidence_snippets非空；blocking_missing为空；evidence_ids 非空）

title: Build per-subsection anchor sheet (evidence → write hooks) [NO PROSE]
acceptance: 每个H3选出可写的 anchor facts（numbers/benchmarks/failures）并附 citations+pointers；无占位/无省略号

title: Build writer context packs (C4→C5 bridge) [NO PROSE]
acceptance: 每个H3生成 writer context pack（rq/thesis/axes/paragraph_plan + comparisons + anchors + allowed bibkeys + must_use）；无占位/无省略号

title: Rewrite claim-evidence matrix from evidence packs [NO PROSE]
acceptance: 矩阵以 evidence packs 为准：每小节含 `- Claim:` 且 `Evidence:`>=2；无占位/无模板句/无省略号

title: Define table schemas (schema-first) [NO PROSE]
acceptance: table_schema.md 定义>=2张表（问题+列+证据来源），无占位/无省略号

title: Fill tables from evidence packs [NO PROSE]
acceptance: tables.md 至少2张表，行内含 citations，且无占位/无省略号

title: Draft visuals (timeline/figures) [NO PROSE]
acceptance: timeline>=8条且含引用；figures>=2个spec；无TODO/无SCAFFOLD

title: Write per-section prose units (H2/H3)
acceptance: 按 H2/H3 生成 `sections/*.md` 小文件（H3 为 body-only，无 heading）；每个含H3的H2生成 `sections/S<sec_id>_lead.md`（2–3段，>=2 cites）以增强章节连贯；H3 引用密度与正文长度按 `queries.md:draft_profile` 门槛：lite(>=7 unique cites; >=~5000 chars; >=6段), survey(>=10 unique cites; >=~9000 chars; >=9段), deep(>=12 unique cites; >=~11000 chars; >=10段)；引用需在本小节绑定集合内（允许同一 H2 章内 sibling 小节的绑定集合复用，但每个 H3 至少 2 个小节专属引用）；若 evidence packs 含数字结果则至少包含 1 个带引用的数字锚点；至少 1 段为 cross-paper synthesis（同段 >=2 cites）；H3 第一段末尾包含 conclusion-first takeaway（对齐 briefs 的 thesis；尽量避免 "This subsection ..." 旁白模板）；无省略号/无占位符

title: Logic polish H3 sections (thesis + connectors)
acceptance: SECTION_LOGIC_REPORT.md 为 PASS；每个 H3 第一段含 thesis/takeaway（结论先行；对齐 briefs thesis；尽量避免 ""This subsection ..."" 模板句）；逻辑连接词密度满足 draft_profile 门槛（因果/转折/递进/提示）；不新增/不修改 citation keys；无占位符

title: Weave transitions (no new facts) [NO PROSE]
acceptance: transitions.md 生成可读过渡句（无新事实/无引用）；无占位/无省略号

title: Merge section files into a single draft
acceptance: DRAFT.md 由 sections+transitions 组装完成；MERGE_REPORT.md 为 PASS（无缺失小节文件）

title: Citation budget report (boost unique cites, NO NEW FACTS)
acceptance: 生成每个H3的 in-scope citation budget（优先未被全局使用的 bibkeys），写入 output/CITATION_BUDGET_REPORT.md；不修改内容；不引入新引用key

title: Inject in-scope citations from budget (NO NEW FACTS)
acceptance: 如果 budget report Gap=0 则 no-op 且 PASS；否则按每个H3建议 keys 注入 1 段短句（每个 key 单独嵌入引用：X [@a], Y [@b]…；禁止单个段尾 [@a; @b; @c] dump）；不得引入新事实/数字；注入后 global unique citations 达到 budget report 的 target；写 output/CITATION_INJECTION_REPORT.md (Status: PASS)

title: Polish draft (de-template + coherence)
acceptance: 去除套话/ellipsis/模板句；保持引用不变；通过 draft 质量门槛（strict gate）

title: Global consistency review (terminology + RQ closure)
acceptance: GLOBAL_REVIEW.md 完整（Status: PASS）且 draft 通过质量门槛；术语一致、结论回扣主线

title: Audit + regression checks (PASS/FAIL)
acceptance: AUDIT_REPORT.md 状态为 PASS；无省略号/占位符；引用key健康（无缺失/重复）

title: Scaffold LaTeX project (main.tex)
acceptance: latex/main.tex 存在且引用 citations/ref.bib；应无 markdown 残留（如 **、[@...]、##）

title: Compile LaTeX to PDF + build report
acceptance: main.pdf 编译成功且可读（无未定义引用/引用key）；PDF 页数 >= 8；build report 记录页数与 warnings 摘要
